ComicInfo.Title: Mouse Trapped
ComicInfo.Summary: Mouse Trapped: Mighty Mouse finds that “cartoon-physics” still works for him – and only him – in the real world. With this knowledge, Mighty Mouse helps Joey with his bully problem, and Joey has an idea that might send Mighty Mouse back home. Using the same cartoon-physics that Mighty Mouse seems to be subject to, Joey draws an inter-dimensional portal so the Mouse of Tomorrow can return home. But something else comes through the portal first.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-29 03:48:23. [CVDB613762] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 07:16:47. [Issue ID 1727065]
